dcterms:description: The command speech dataset consists of simple sentence utterances spoken by individuals in their daily life to an AI assistant.
dcterms:title: Command Speech Dataset (Male/Female)

dcterms:description: The command speech dataset consists of simple sentence utterances spoken by infants and children in their daily life to an AI assistant.
dcterms:title: Command Speech Dataset (Infants/Children)

dcterms:description: The command speech dataset consists of simple sentence utterances spoken by elderly male and female individuals in their daily life to an AI assistant.
dcterms:title: Command Speech Dataset (Elderly Male/Female)

dcterms:description: The conversation speech dataset consists of simple sentence utterances spoken by individuals in their daily life.
dcterms:title: Conversation Speech Dataset (Male/Female)

dcterms:description: The conversation speech dataset consists of simple sentence utterances spoken by infants and children in their daily life.
dcterms:title: Conversation Speech Dataset (Infants/Children)

dcterms:description: The conversation speech dataset consists of simple sentence utterances spoken by elderly male and female individuals in their daily life.
dcterms:title: Conversation Speech Dataset (Elderly Male/Female)

dcterms:description: The emotion and speaking style-specific speech dataset consists of speeches recorded by 50 professional voice actors in a studio, representing 7 emotions and 5 speaking styles.
dcterms:title: Emotion and Speaking Style-Specific Speech Dataset

dcterms:description: The Korean speakers' foreign language speech dataset consists of simple sentence utterances containing foreign words spoken by individuals.
dcterms:title: Korean Speakers' Foreign Language Speech Dataset

dcterms:description: The Korean speech dataset consists of conversational speech recorded by two individuals on various topics, segmented into sentence units.
dcterms:title: Korean Speech Dataset
